backend/main.mo: Defines types and state for inspections, detailed inspections, user profiles, and exposes profile query functions with access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence file mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of each frontend file describing its purpose within the inspection workflow and UI.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component controlling authentication, navigation between pages, and global layout.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component showing branding and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header component with app title, dashboard navigation, and authenticated user menu with logout.
frontend/src/components/preInspection/Ac: Manages add/update/remove UI for electrical and non‑electrical accessories using tabbed inputs.
frontend/src/components/preInspection/Gl: Provides a table to edit glass status entries, including safe/broken toggles and default glass insertion.
frontend/src/components/preInspection/Pa: Renders a parts checklist table allowing status selection, remarks editing, and loading default parts.
frontend/src/components/preInspection/Ye: Simple reusable radio field for selecting a boolean yes/no value.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Empty or incomplete file with no implementation content.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an auth provider and hook for managing Internet Identity login, logout, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines react‑query hooks for creating inspections, saving pre‑inspection data, adding photos, and fetching inspection details.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and defines extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes. Applies global border, background, and text styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app root with React Query and Internet Identity provider. Loads global styles and renders the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays dashboard cards for starting inspections and viewing reports, and lists recent inspection records. Fetches user inspections and handles loading states.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Provides a mobile-number login form using Internet Identity and validates input before triggering authentication. Shows loading state and error toasts.
frontend/src/pages/PdfPreviewPage.tsx: Loads inspection data, validates it, previews a report, and allows generating or downloading a PDF via a print window. Loads photos and shows validation alerts.
frontend/src/pages/PhotoCapturePage.tsx: Handles camera access, video readiness, GPS permission, and capturing photos with metadata for an inspection. Manages camera lifecycle and error states.
frontend/src/pages/PreInspectionFormPage: Displays and saves a multi-section pre‑inspection form populated from inspection data. Validates presence of inspection ID and navigates to photo capture after saving.
frontend/src/pages/RemarksPage.tsx: Provides a remarks form for an inspection, saving notes and navigating to preview while validating input.
frontend/src/pages/ReportsPage.tsx: Displays a list of user inspections with loading/error states and allows navigating to individual report previews.
frontend/src/pages/VehicleDetailsPage.ts: Collects and validates vehicle and customer details, creates a detailed inspection, and navigates to the next form.
frontend/src/utils/preInspectionSchema.t: Exports default lists of vehicle parts and glass items used for pre‑inspection checklists.
frontend/src/utils/reportValidation.ts: Validates a detailed inspection object, returning missing or invalid fields as error messages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash‑based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state and version plus a list of existing features, each describing authentication, actor creation, access control, inspection creation, photo capture, and metadata submission capabilities.
